events.message: The customer reported an auto accident involving their vehicle hitting a street pole on May 9th.
The claim was categorized under 'Auto Accident' after reviewing the initial details and damages provided.
An insurance agent was assigned to the case to guide the claimant through the process and offer assistance.
Acknowledgement of the claim was sent to the customer confirming receipt and next steps in the process.
The insurance company requested additional documents including photos of the damaged vehicle and police report.
Customer submitted all required documents including detailed photos and an official police accident report.
The claims investigation team began reviewing the submitted evidence and verifying the accident details.
Investigation concluded confirming the accident circumstances and vehicle damage assessment for claim evaluation.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover the repair costs and related expenses as per policy terms.
The customer responded positively, expressing satisfaction with the proposed settlement amount.
Approval was granted to proceed with the settlement based on investigation results and customer acceptance.
The payment was issued promptly to the customerâ€™s account to cover vehicle repair costs and deductibles.
The claim has been officially closed after successful settlement and payment have been completed.
All claim documentation and records were archived securely for future reference and compliance purposes.
